Articles.Content:
Hello, in the readme, I readed that on a windows 64x device the game can crash. If that happend, report it.

So, my problem:

When I'm playing career like the 5th hour in a game, I can't go anywhere from the space center. Only to the science building. When I click back,

the game crashes. I don't know is this is cause of the 64x, but now I'm going to try the 32x device.

- Tieme

This sounds like the symptoms of bug #3243. Take a look at that bug. If that sounds like what happened to you, some solutions can be found here- http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/105651-FIX-KSC-Buildings-Lock-Up-Can-t-Click-on-Anything-Firing-Kerbal-Crashes-Game
